apps.author: libre-tube
apps.name: LibreTube
apps.changeLog:
> [!IMPORTANT]  
> We dropped support for split-ABI APKs. If you're using and automated tool to download APKs, please adjust as necessary.

> [!NOTE]
> ## Release Highlights
> * Fixed an error with playing videos
> * Removed split-abi-apks
> * Always remember playback speed
> * Fast forward video on long press
> * Improved sleeptimer with slow volume fade-out and quick-select buttons
> * Display video chapters in timebar
> * Include filtered search history in search suggestion
> * Prefer untranslated video title if available
> * Many more bug fixes and performance improvement
### :sparkles: New Features
- [`0e9c0ca`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/0e9c0cad22cc906903cdbece4eb0ea685ee49a7b) - remove release action *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`e9759bd`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/e9759bdf3e3b886b486f90347007fc743e59c6bb) - **video player**: improve touch gesture handling *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`4491a42`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/4491a42f4bdea28f694a673118854c3a46dd9d1c) - **video player**: increase center screen gesture detection area *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`5ef3d89`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/5ef3d897a81aac4dd90719fd940e5e89129d92b6) - fast forward video on long press *(commit by @Bilal-Ahmad123)*
- [`6d4f3d6`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/6d4f3d6c4b529ef93d5d8fbd767c9188be59a45d) - **DASH**: remove unsatisfiable filter *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`79548a9`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/79548a981ba90e19b95f2861c3f80808d75d2eb6) - **Backup**: notify user about result of backup creation *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`463b77f`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/463b77f3432c03596934e2bd7b259b79695fd664) - **Preferences**: remove unused preferences *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`a7bb77b`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/a7bb77b9184a370babda806d35e2453a9acbfabf) - **LocalFeed**: prefer untranslated video title if available *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`947727a`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/947727a7a907d7904651e3f610a66f6ed70d4b10) - **Preferences**: remove codec preferences *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`c9e22dc`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/c9e22dc69a2ee0347ccdec5085098b1f56b86f23) - **video player**: add visual feedback when fullscreen gesture is in progress *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`d013ccb`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/d013ccb146a44e7d714d10de59e65d7c37af89a9) - **video player**: allow swipe up on the entire view to enter fullscreen *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`a1c4772`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/a1c47724502b16f2ad634a3bb8cf9de348d79aac) - always remember playback speed *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`6cbd129`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/6cbd12948488e25095083df9708400624c7a41d2) - generate content-bound poToken *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`4cd6507`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/4cd6507abc717b880844f7835985e46cc7a5f45f) - **sleep-timer**: show minutes left in player menu *(PR #8034 by @PavelStefanov)*
- [`33448b7`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/33448b7f7c39a5cea314a66adef6047424ce1800) - **Player**: display chapters in timebar *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`2decf2b`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/2decf2b5998555212ff840043be30ac9549e72e2) - **Player**: center chapter breaks *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`993888a`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/993888aa5cf92cc28ae9098cdccdd36cf0f04f5d) - improve sleep timer with smooth player volume fade out *(commit by @PavelStefanov)*
- [`944f04f`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/944f04f679e0243cd9af943a152c5d7ad65a1813) - add quick-select chips to sleep timer *(commit by @PavelStefanov)*
- [`e2f42f8`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/e2f42f8afa4d46e755188aacb6f6825467406f91) - **SleepTimer**: start timer immediately when selecting chip *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`1cdb3e0`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/1cdb3e008a28bfa59973da5c78e0a827c0c92b68) - **SleepTimer**: allow chip scrolling beyond screen-edges *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`a4f440e`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/a4f440ec74a50dc63a212454987fc1e02ee4ccb1) - **SleepTimer**: center buttons *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`381538a`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/381538adb0b35603eb04e56683a99867fa793c10) - include filtered search history in search suggestion *(commit by @dhanuarf)*

### :bug: Bug Fixes
- [`856b8fd`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/856b8fdf625b9255084b0a512f01012775869ee6) - **LocalFeedRepository**: update subscribed channels *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`d72cd60`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/d72cd60356177115f1e2529c4babcac22df77e95) - **video player**: preview frame jumping around the screen when seeking *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`dd7fa6c`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/dd7fa6c5b981d839b59a12b1870f9678e1073055) - **Import**: allow subtitles without URL *(commit by @Bilal-Ahmad123)*
- [`5c3694d`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/5c3694db0b94a13dc9105b6ada50cb4b6b17b907) - **deps**: update dependency androidx.swiperefreshlayout:swiperefreshlayout to v1.2.0 *(commit by @renovate[bot])*
- [`87d004c`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/87d004c0836fa1c20d0e982513ea873b899ac4d9) - occasional crash when opening YouTube link *(commit by @Bnyro)*
- [`019b216`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/019b216df83b24411899c41a72acd9ff82d2603b) - crash when clicking chapters/switch to video in audio player before video loaded *(commit by @Bnyro)*
- [`1411fcf`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/1411fcfa820695d275483758ae5b3aa415f41ec8) - switching video in audio only mode opens video player instead of audio player *(commit by @Bnyro)*
- [`2e41934`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/2e41934b8579ff0e1dd85f9b20ceb6dc69b6d932) - initialize `brightnessHelper` before `playerGestureController` *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`2ff9120`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/2ff9120b62b8502cf29afe080024ef76cc2b25a7) - Crash when starting online stream while offline stream in progress *(commit by @shantanu1k)*
- [`435cf50`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/435cf50c06c4ac2201ced918cf384bbf6c008dfd) - **deps**: update media3 to v1.9.0 *(commit by @renovate[bot])*
- [`8018b1d`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/8018b1dc61c5db14c04efb78a0337b9b8d6589b1) - **deps**: update dependency com.google.android.material:material to v1.14.0-alpha08 *(commit by @renovate[bot])*
- [`845cd79`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/845cd7998aa0e907f7b0534e5db5516990d44d4d) - **video player**: glitch when exiting from fullscreen on short videos *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`53b95e2`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/53b95e22eb300e1881a15371e1add6c9a64dd297) - avoid leaking `SubscriptionsFragment` *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`c50592d`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/c50592d72dffba55e60444aeae351655339b8b25) - prevent videos from moving to start when re-adding them to a local playlist *(PR #8061 by @PavelStefanov)*
- [`14f2b3b`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/14f2b3bb6606515f4165eb6006e1ed22c4eb497d) - subscriptions button reset its state when scrolling *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`bb0ad22`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/bb0ad22ed350bfbaae4c8f8debf593a5ddd936b1) - **deps**: update media3 to v1.9.1 *(commit by @renovate[bot])*
- [`ccad908`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/ccad908c97beb1a7887a153a23a6ac6d65685aa2) - search query being added to history on back navigation *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`fc1c5d8`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/fc1c5d8620e60addc6eb627ae4289c9889dfb5e4) - ignore missing `re2j` classes *(commit by @FineFindus)*

### :zap: Performance Improvements
- [`b7669eb`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/b7669ebf25e9e86f4ededbc1df49fb94cd6771b0) - avoid second database call *(commit by @FineFindus)*

### :recycle: Refactors
- [`752c4f8`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/752c4f86c51e04100b487e530eacf7ebb0c7db3b) - remove local feed videos when unsubscribing *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`0a95d96`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/0a95d965b42ff11b9d9a4aa19e260a02c9202154) - remove unnecessary `this` *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`823ce93`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/823ce93f7b7a8bc324c8a0d0bad09546e074521c) - simplify finding `PlayerFragment` method in `CustomExoPlayerView` *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`d9710c8`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/d9710c87527fdbe93482db63aa7f716ab535fe85) - implement video player gesture directly in `onTouchEvent()` *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`08e4f12`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/08e4f12dacb4722935b8ab3051b40905b1e27bfb) - move some initializations to constructor level in `CustomExoPlayerView` *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`cc2585e`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/cc2585e2d021d421398c15f81c77fc4792afb159) - simplify some functions that has default parameters *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`37cd5e7`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/37cd5e7add9e67131797b1501db98182dd781111) - define some constants in `companion object` *(commit by @dhanuarf)*
- [`b0e2ddb`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/b0e2ddbac7b73844d0eef45df65da0b05c7807f4) - remove unnecessary null assertion *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`61f3201`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/61f3201b35e5a3381b25224daf1ae0227a4e02e2) - remove unnecessary `lateinit` modifier *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`3eb429f`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/3eb429f2a46cd9462d8b750b229d542e4691882b) - use elvis operator for early return *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`344c781`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/344c78104da8aca60a0b4ac374fdc1dbd31369b1) - **Player/ChapterTimeBar**: initialize immutable variables once *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`f20defa`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/f20defab1fa1f32ef954259999ad42ac99442c85) - create sleep timer chips programmatically *(commit by @PavelStefanov)*
- [`fb23776`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/fb2377654a96e63a69dc72c2550fce3eecceb9b5) - move quick-select chips above time input field *(commit by @PavelStefanov)*

### :wrench: Chores
- [`b75dd6e`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/b75dd6e48239f2e6b85ee0a4471139de15f4bd4f) - mark notification frequency values as translatable *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`b9f1b2e`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/b9f1b2ea7e54aa249449512f2b71509a930a14f1) - remove dead piped instances linking *(commit by @FineFindus)*
- [`3864e6d`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/3864e6d7576c80b9c229b3c2c5695f8b3865d880) - **deps**: update gradle to v9.2.1 *(commit by @renovate[bot])*
- [`1cbec1f`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/1cbec1f6f5412724bb279037bdb63b4aa32ac48b) - **deps**: update actions/checkout action to v6 *(commit by @renovate[bot])*
- [`90b5271`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/90b52711f53f24f1be800665e4a99cc69cbb6baf) - **deps**: update actions/upload-artifact action to v6 *(commit by @renovate[bot])*
- [`ae69dc4`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/ae69dc4b03f48e222514b7aaffba106df680da8c) - remove no longer needed changelog script *(commit by @Bnyro)*
- [`fc9c639`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/fc9c639f89fadfdd2daa105edffd568a169e0e0f) - **deps**: update ilharp/sign-android-release action to v2 *(commit by @renovate[bot])*
- [`0807875`](https://github.com/libre-tube/LibreTube/commit/0807875b1290b2435146a427fdae060b65569531) - bump version to v0.30.0 *(commit by @FineFindus)*

apps.author: InfinityLoop1308
apps.name: PipePipe
apps.changeLog:
### Bug Fixes

- Some videos fail to load with "The page needs to be reloaded" error (YouTube)
- Cannot open videos (NicoNico)

<hr/>
If you're enjoying PipePipe, please help share it with your friends. Every bit of support means a lot to us!
<hr/>

### Which APK should you download?

- arm64-v8a should work on most devices.
- armeabi-v7a if your device is a 15+ year old phone.
- x86_64 for 64-bit Android simulators (on a PC).
- x86 for 32-bit simulators.

If these rules not working, download the universal APK. It should work on any device.
Please note downloading videos from BiliBili/NicoNico are not supported on armeabi-v7a/x86 devices due to technical reasons.

apps.author: X1nto
apps.name: Mauth
apps.changeLog:
New Features
============
- You can now import and export accounts from/to Google Authenticator and other compatible apps

Changes
=======
- Improved the QR code scanner accuracy and performance
- Decreased the account digit range from 1-10 to 6-9 to align with the OTP spec 
- Updated translations

Fixes
=====
- Fixed PIN layout issues on some device sizes and screen orientations

Additional Notes
=============

Mauth has been published to Google Play. I need 14 active testers to be eligible for publishing. Please join the Mauth [Google Group](https://groups.google.com/g/mauth-testers) if you want to become a tester.

apps.author: localsend
apps.name: LocalSend
apps.changeLog:
### Summary

A small interim release before WebRTC is stable (https://github.com/localsend/localsend/pull/2204)

- feat: add advanced setting to filter network interfaces (@Tienisto)
- feat(mobile): swipe gesture to select multiple media files (@Tienisto)
- feat(windows): when pasting an image, automatically convert it to PNG (@BrianMwit)
- feat(android): add option to open gallery when image/video was automatically saved (@Tienisto)
- fix: path traversal vulnerability when saving files (@Tienisto)
- fix: black screen when tapping on "Back" twice in "Share via link" (@Tienisto)
- fix(macos): window disappears on command key when minimize to tray is enabled (@Tienisto)
- fix(windows): do not poll local IP resulting in unwanted location permissions (@Tienisto)

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/localsend/localsend/blob/main/app/assets/CHANGELOG.md)

apps.author: impalex
apps.name: Knock on Ports
apps.changeLog:
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes and stability improvements.
‚Ä¢ New option to set UDP payload size separately from its content.

apps.author: immich-app
apps.name: Immich
apps.changeLog:
# v2.5.2

_`v2.5.1` has been sacrificed for the release God, so the Android app can now be released_


> [!NOTE]
> This version of the mobile app will pull down some data from the server to fix the incorrect data in the mobile app local database, so you will see the sync icon running for a little bit

## Hotfixes

- Fixed a bug where the video aspect ratio is played incorrectly for the remote asset
- Fixed a bug where memory generation failed
- Fixed a bug where memories don't show on the web until the page is refreshed
- Fixed a bug where the `Load original image` option doesn't render the image on iOS


## What's Changed
### üêõ Bug fixes
* fix: deleting asset from asset-viewer on search results by @midzelis in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25596
* fix: escape handling in search asset viewer by @danieldietzler in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25621
* fix: correctly show owner in album options modal by @danieldietzler in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25618
* fix(server): don't assume maintenance action is set by @insertish in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25622
* fix: album card ranges by @danieldietzler in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25639
* fix(mobile): show controls by default on motion photos by @goalie2002 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25638
* fix: escape handling by @danieldietzler in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25627
* fix(mobile): set correct system-ui mode on asset viewer init by @goalie2002 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25610
* fix(mobile): actually load original image by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25646
* fix: width and height migration issue by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25643
* fix: memory lane by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25652
* fix: memory generation by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25650
* fix(mobile): tall image scrolling by @ByteSizedMarius in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/25649


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v2.5.0...v2.5.2
